General.Name: Tracxn Technologies Limited
General.Description: Tracxn Technologies Limited operates a platform that provides information of startups. It operates a software as a services platform that offers services in the areas of CRM, sector research, datasets, diligence, global and local tracking, report, sourcing, insights, coverage, and apps and extensions. It serves venture capital funds, private equity funds, accelerators and incubators, investment banks, corporate innovation, corporate development and M and A teams, and journalists and publication sector. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Bengaluru, India.
